## Basic Info.

-   Name: [Imperial Federation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imperial_Federation), Map of the world showing the extent of the British Empire in 1886

-   Who

    -   Information Compilation: 존 콜롬 [John Colomb](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Colomb) (1 May 1838 – 27 May 1909)

    -   Drawing: 월터 크레인 [Walter Crane](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Crane) (15 August 1845 – 14 March 1915)

-   When: 1886

-   Where: [Boston Public Library](https://collections.leventhalmap.org/search/commonwealth:x633f896s)

    -   *Graphic: An Illustrated Weekly Newspaper* as a color supplement to mark Queen Victoria's Golden Jubilee [@harwood2012, 130]

-   Size: 63 x 86 cm

![https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imperial_Federation](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/65/Imperial_Federation%2C_Map_of_the_World_Showing_the_Extent_of_the_British_Empire_in_1886_%28levelled%29.jpg/2560px-Imperial_Federation%2C_Map_of_the_World_Showing_the_Extent_of_the_British_Empire_in_1886_%28levelled%29.jpg)
